headline: Western Digital (WDC) Scores a Buy – Analysts Say AI Spending & Cheap Valuation Make It a Winner
summary: We recently published a list of 10 AI Stocks to Watch Now. headline: Western Digital Stock Is Attractive, Backed By Cheap Valuation And AI Surge: Analyst
summary: Benchmark analyst Mark Miller upgraded Western Digital Corp (NASDAQ:WDC) from Hold to Buy with a $55 price target Thursday. Investor’s concern over tariffs has produced compelling valuations for some tech hardware stocks. In Benchmark’s 26 years of coverage, the forward valuations of hard drive stocks have typically ranged from mid-single digits to teen multiples. Also Read: Western Digital Faces ‘Challenging Pricing Environment,’ But There’s Long-Term Potential: Analysts Western Digital stock i

headline: Western Digital (WDC) Surges 15.1%: Is This an Indication of Further Gains?
summary: Western Digital (WDC) saw its shares surge in the last session with trading volume being higher than average. The latest trend in earnings estimate revisions could translate into further price increase in the near term.
